alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Putnam (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 11:07AM CST until further notice by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lincoln IL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Henry affecting Marshall and Putnam Counties. Illinois River at Peoria affecting Tazewell, Woodford and Peoria Counties. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Henry. * WHEN...From Sunday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 19.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Sunday morning and continue rising to a crest of 25.5 feet early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 23.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Illinois River Henry 23.0 19.5 Fri 10 am CS 21.2 23.2 24.5 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to remain aware of the latest forecasts and associated flood risk for their area. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
